title: Blended Language Learning Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language comprehension skills and fundamental ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Blended approach combining real-time interaction and asynchronous learning activities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with continuous monitoring of learning effectiveness through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners acquire basic communication expressions by completing video lectures (10 minutes) and quizzes (5 questions) three or more times per week on mobile-based digital platforms
Learners enhance target language speaking proficiency through group activities (role-play, discussions) in Zoom-based real-time classes
Learners develop self-directed learning strategies through weekly learning journal entries and peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
